item.title: Research Assistant
item.description: Research Assistant at York University Active and Attentive Vision Lab Supervisor: John K. Tsotsos Description": Addition of new features to TarzaNN â€“ a neural network simulator. Implemented in C++. Report can be found here. Electrophysiology Lab (October 2013 - April 2014) Supervisor: Roger Lewis Description": Design and development of an electronic circuit for current-voltage measurements of Neurospora crassa hyphae. Report can be found here. For more information about the project, click here.

item.title: Attentional Control Signals, Poster Publication
item.description: Publication: R. Sengupta, O. Abid, A. Bachoo, J.K. Tsotsos 2017. Attentional blink as a product of attentional control signals: A computational investigation, VSS 2017. [Link]. Implemented in C++ with TarzaNN framework. A video demonstration shows the GUI of the system processing a stream of input letters.
